content: crochet a beautiful striped blanket for your home with this easy beginner-friendly crochet pattern this cozy throw blanket would look cute in any space details - pattern is written in standard us terms - basic knowledge of beginner stitches is needed to make this pattern - blanket size 48 x 60 inches materials needed - 7 skeins of lion brand hue + me yarn in the color desert weight 5/ 4 4 oz 137 yds a total of 959 yards or you can use another number 5 bulky weight yarn - 4 skeins of lion brand hue + me yarn in the color salt weight 5/ 4 4 oz 137 yds a total of 548 yards or you can use another number 5 bulky weight yarn - 3 skeins of lion brand hue + me yarn in the color toast weight 5/ 4 4 oz 137 yds a total of 411 yards or you can use another number 5 bulky weight yarn - 8 0 mm crochet hook - darning needle - scissors
